def_cn: 恢复健康（或体力、精神）的
def_en: Something that is restorative makes you feel healthier, stronger, or more cheerful after you have been feeling tired, weak, or miserable.

def_cn: 使人恢复健康（或体力、精神）的事物
def_en: If you describe something as a restorative, you mean that it makes you feel healthier, stronger, or more cheerful after you have been feeling tired, weak, or miserable.
